website_summaries.verdict: With easy-to-use controls, a nice tilting LCD, and pleasing photo quality, the affordable 34x zoom Nikon Coolpix L830 is a solid pick.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix L830 is easy enough for just about anyone to pick up and use
it has higher-end features for its price, such as a tilting high-res LCD
and has very good daylight photo and movie quality
cons: No electronic viewfinder or control over shutter speed and aperture might be disappointing for some
Autofocus performance is on the slow side when the lens is zoomed in as well as in low light or indoors

customer_reviews.title: Love my CoolPix L830
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera as a replacement for a 3 year-old camera that I damaged accidentally - same model. I had shot over 30,000 pictures with my original camera... many of which were extreme close-ups.. and I was comfortable with it. So I bought a 'new' one...
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Everhart

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: This has been a total dream camera for me, have owned plenty of cameras before, but I guess never tried to find a real nice one in the past. I wanted to capture the moments of my beloved cat growing up, as she won't stay a little baby forever, but have found plenty of other uses for it, once I realized what quality photos this takes, the pictures come off so clear, colorful, vibrant, and detailed. I wasn't even thinking that it would have a video on it for the first couple months, just was so focused on the pictures, then discovered it takes amazing quality video with sound as well, cannot say enough good things about this camera!
customer_reviews.author: tandra

customer_reviews.title: This camera is amazing. Well
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing. Well, beyond amazing. My husband and I went to Best Buy to play with cameras before purchasing. The price here was better than the sale/rebate price in the store so we opted to purchase through Amazon. I can list specs all day and explain how great it is but what I say wont change anything. Stop by Best Buy or similar and play around with it. I promise you wont be let down! Its truly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: I read all of these wonderful reviews- and was so excited
customer_reviews.text: I am confused by this camera. I read all of these wonderful reviews- and was so excited!! But-- i seem to get tons of blur when photographing a fast-moving two year old in action. I want to love it-- but not sure yet if I'm doing something wrong, or if this camera is more intended for still shots of Rome. Anyone have any thoughts on this?
customer_reviews.author: Summer Fun mom

customer_reviews.title: Cool camera but a battery drainer!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with this camera is it drains brand new batteries in one hour... smh I've tried various kinds, it's pretty frustrating. Everything else I like.. It's candy-apple red & loaded with features (entirely too many to remember or name).
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice pics, the "auto modes" work great
customer_reviews.text: Camera does everything I wanted it to do. Very very nice pics, the "auto modes" work great,..and I don't miss not having a viewfinder. the only annoyance is if you happen to turn the camera with the lens cap on, it displays a message and won't go away, even after removing the cap. Kinda makes sense, but just a slight inconvenience because you need to remove the lens cap first, then turn the camera back on.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for Travel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel camera. Large enough to have more features and exceptional quality but light and small enouigh to drop in a bag, point and shoot. I'm thrilled with the quality of the photos, outdoors and indoors. My only problem is that it doesn't h ave a view finder. I knew that going in but hoped that the swivel viewing screen might help. It just doesn't help enough. I would recommend the camera but also mention that to anyone wishing to buy it. I like the AA battery, especially when traveling in Europe. Plus it's very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Pastore

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very easy to use, FANTASTIC zoom, and has a decent battery life; other advantage of the batteries is that you can pick up AAs just about anywhere, unlike if you run down specialized batteries. Cons: Casing feels very much like cheap plastic, so it doesn't feel very sturdy. Missing a few features that I liked to use in my Coolpix 8100. And you have to manually pop up the flash - you can't set it to automatically pop it up if needed. Overall, a good camera for the price if you want to step up just a bit from the pocket-size point and shoots.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: A real hassle!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to go with my Nikon Coolpix P520 18.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera so that I could download pictures daily and never have to deal with the potential of loosing storage cards on a very long trip. It can be frustrating to use because it drops the connection regularly. Make sure that no other WIFI devices are connected because they will make it difficult, if not impossible, to even get this to talk to your device and drop it even more frequently. After downloading nearly 200 photos everyday for 11 weeks, I as ready to throw it out a window!! I wished I'd just bought the camera model with built in WIFI.
customer_reviews.author: KitV

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful camera!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this camera! It was well worth the purchase! We used this on our trip to San Antonio and Corpus Christi and were not disappointed in the quality of the pictures taken by it! I was really stressed about which type of camera to buy and was unsure on if this camera would work. I have not been disappointed! THe clarity of it is wonderful and it is extremely easy to use! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S. Scheck

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. It shoots nice pictures. The auto mode works in most cases. If you play around with the settings a little bit you find out what works best. We were at the Niagara Falls and even the evening pictures of the Falls turned out great, I was surprised. I love that you can tilt the screen, it came in handy so many times! The battery life is good too. Oh, and the zoom is beyond awesome, love it! All in all I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this same camera. I bought it for my husband because our old L830 was so beat from use that some of the functions started messing up (understandable when over 1 million photos taken). I highly recommend anyone looking for a great quality camera for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but.....
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice camera. It's easy to use and takes quality pictures. My main complaint is how fast it goes through batteries. I received a good price on this camera and took a chance in it due to the positive reviews. I've found it's worth spending a bit more money due to the high amount of cost involved with purchasing batteries. I have now had this camera for a few months. It intermittently downloads. I can not recommend this camera. To many issues.
customer_reviews.author: nq

customer_reviews.title: Very good Camera, needs rechargeable battery
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying getting used to this camera. We bought as an upgrade to a previous Coolpix model and was best money spent. Have only noted two downsides; miss my rechargeable battery (have to buy separate) and some lighting situations are tricky on the Easy Auto. At baby shower there were a lot of windows and many of the shots were overexposed. I've learned how to manually correct these, but had my sister taking photos and wanted them to be easy for her. Disappointed to not have those pictures. Otherwise love the clarity and quick focus feature. Easy to handle and carry for outings too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Keeler

customer_reviews.title: Quality pics at a quality price!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to take pictures to post for products. However, it has more than paid for itself in the quality of pictures it has taken! The zoom quality is excellent and so are the videos it takes. My husband took pictures of our son coaching across the gym and the zoom feature allowed him to be right next to him as he ran back and forth on the gym floor. So much better than the iPhone ever did.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera to take pictures and video of my son graduating boot camp. I knew we would not be close so the high power zoom is what made me choose this model. It was great, got some wonderful pictures on the oppisite side of the parade grounds. The video's turned out good also. The only near negative is that the view screen is hard to see in bright sun while doing video.
customer_reviews.author: Manning Family

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix L830 16MP CMOS
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the camera. What I don't like about it, is that it takes blurry pictures. I thought it was just me, but my son, who is a professional photographer, produced blurry pictures as well with this camera. I cannot return it, as I did not use it immediately upon purchasing it. I have owned it for a few months now. It has been carefully stored in a camera bag, which I purchased at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: seashellrocker

customer_reviews.title: The Zoom is Excellent!! The picture quality is Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for the wife. She really enjoys using it . The Zoom is Excellent!! The picture quality is Brilliant. This camera has the ability to make a rookie shoot like a Pro!. We have had other Nikkon cameras But we love the ability to shoot stills as well as videos. Only drawback we have found is the batteries don't last long (4ea. AA). Highly suggest getting rechargeable batteries and having some on standby. We will get another one of these, so maybe I will get to use it! Oh yeah, he viewing screen is Great, too. Big size makes for good viewing and reviewing. I guess by now, you can tell I like it, Period!!
customer_reviews.author: James Byrd, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good point and shoot camera, but the lack of a viewfinder makes finding a small subject sometimes difficult. The optical zoom works very well. An effective small center focus would be a great addition, but the camera can be tricked into focusing on small objects in front of large bright ones.
customer_reviews.author: dbnaples

customer_reviews.title: I read half of the reviews for this camera, ...
customer_reviews.text: I read half of the reviews for this camera, and honestly the only thing thats not 5 star about this camera is positioning yourself the right way for auto focus to be spot on. Otherwise its picture quality is outstanding, My honest suggestion is to mess around with the scenes before you judge, and make sure you are using the correct scene for the type of photo you are taking. This is a high quality camera for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with a new, more capable camera.
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking forward to using this camera on the trips I take throughout different parts of the world. I still have lots to learn about it, but so far it is living up to my expectations. I was pleased with the speed and security of the delivery of this camera to my home. I was somewhat surprised that Nikon doesn't include a printed copy of a user's manual, but have downloaded the manual in pdf form from their website. Answers to questions have also been quick to arrive from the camera provider.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Editing software but not a very good camera
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly like the L100 EXCEPT it attempts to include a full Photoshop program inside! Nuts to that! I just want a decent digital camera with more control -- this is like a kids toy with all kinds of ways to take photo, with highlights for one color, b/lw variations, etc etc. Not a GOOD camera, just has "good" editing on board the camera. Weird. Would rather have the old L100 back!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Licia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! So easy to use, and takes wonderful pictures! I am in no way a professional photographer, so the technical stuff I can't tell you about, but this camera makes taking good pictures so easy! I really love the selective color feature, which I had used on my pro-photog mom's camera, and I try to use it as often as I can! It's light weight, and looks wonderful. Can't wait until summer where I can take my camera on my long walks to get awesome nature pictures. For now, I just settle with the flowers on my nightstand! LOL
customer_reviews.author: AshleySchwentner

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my Panasonic Lumix with 10x zoom. The 34 X Optical zoom is incredible! Not only that, the image stabilization is so good, I'm taking nicer photos at 34X zoom than I could ever do on the Lumix at 10x.. Pictures are really high quality and the videos are really pleasing too. I'm no camera pro, I just take photos for my family and website. This camera was priced right, is easy to use and gives me great pictures, so I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: ... to get all my pictures to come out real good, anything with a slight motion there is a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have yet been able to get all my pictures to come out real good, anything with a slight motion there is a 50 50 chance it will be blurry. It helps when the flash is used but on auto it is not always needed. I had a Coolpix S4 and this does not even come close, the S4 the lens was not functioning right and the cost was too much for how old it was. I would not recommend this and will probably replace it, too bad for Nikon because guess what brand it wont be!
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Just wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for use on my trip to Africa, particularly for the zoom capabilities while shooting photos of wildlife. I must tell you that this camera did not disappoint and my fellow travellers were envious of my beautiful shots. The camera is relatively lightweight and was a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Does much of what my expensive DSLR does, but cheaper...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera system for the price and it does so much of what my very expensive DSLR does. Small, compact, great photo's video and the sound is pretty decent. It has a lot of features that take time to learn and I recommend shooting with it a lot, to know how they all work. It does have a few draw backs...In Auto modes, the complete range of the ISO isn't fully used. You have to put it in manual and adjust the ISO. It uses 4 AA's, which is nice and you can get packs of 8 for $2 at the dollar type stores...
customer_reviews.author: Steve Anton

customer_reviews.title: A great point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: A great value, I have had 3 other point and shot cameras( 2 Fuji,1 cannon) this one is the best. Great pictures and I like the 34x zoom lens. The camera is not to heavy to carry all day. I just returned from a 3 week vacation to three national parks. I must have taken 300 pictures and at least 6 videos, I use standard Duracell batteries and never had a power shortage. I highly recommend this camera to anyone who wants a very solid point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: TF.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has an incredible zoom. Many features available that I was unaware of as well. It is so fun and easy to use for close ups, portraits, landscapes, motion shots, etc. Excellent quality for the cost! The rechargable batteries work great as well and last a long time. I also love the red color! I would recommend this camera highly. It is the best I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: lisa bordelon

customer_reviews.title: It's very good. The AA batteries make last-second adventures very easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on many vacations now. It's very good. The AA batteries make last-second adventures very easy if you forget to charge your camera, like me. I recommend getting some rechargeable batteries with it. It's not going to compete with a DSLR and it doesn't have a way to easily add zooming lenses, but the combination of comfort, quality, and portability make it a really handy point and shoot model.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Schauder

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO PLEASED. I have always wanted a Nikon. Though it is inexpensive (for a Nikon) it certainly lives up to its heritage. I am very impressed with the ease of use. I got great pictures of my products on the first try. I hope the PET setting helps me get a pictures of a cat face not the back of his head. I have been though a DIMAGE, it died. My Fuji FinePix developed nasty lines. So here I am. I couldn't be happier and it is a luscious red that matches my truck.
customer_reviews.author: C.Farnham

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with this camera since I bought it in late May. The price was right and I got it before a long-anticipated trip to Alaska. The photos from the trip turned out great and more than one person has asked about the camera I used to take them. This is my third Nikon in the past ten years (and was cheaper than the 5.1 MP/3 X zoom camera I bought in 2005) and I'm still using the other two along with this one.
customer_reviews.author: David Minnick

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this point and shoot camera is a good first camera for someone entering the hobby or for someone to take on a trip and not worry as much if it gets broken/stolen as a full lens/cam SLR camera setup. I wish there was a cover for the screen or some way to flip the screen around to protect it from scratches but I installed a screen protector and have had no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Robob

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this camera I bought this because I have always ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera I bought this because I have always wanted a nikon camera took me a little getting used to because I was used to my old generic camera, It takes really nice high quality pictures, even takes nice sunsets or darker pics and great videos and has great zoom, it has a good lens cover that locks on the camera its not as pink as it looked online its more red
customer_reviews.author: Britski08

customer_reviews.title: I like this little Nikon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace an older digital camera that was so slow to snap the photo that the subject would move before it was done and all I got was a blur. I like this little Nikon. It's easy to use and takes great pics. I am not a photographer and I can't use the jargon. I just like the pictures it takes and that an untrained person such as myself can use it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Julie W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this camera. He uses it as binoculars at times, zooming in to read signs on sides of work trucks & equipment on neighboring properties. In other words, his "spy" camera. Pictures are crisp, colors are bright. A great addition to our cell phones when we want "real" pictures to send to others as keepsakes. Flip up viewfinder easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: A.K. Wintzer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price - excellent value and image stabilization works wonders
customer_reviews.text: A great camera for the price. I picked this over a Canon because it has a macro feature. I took photos from horseback (moving) and the camera did well with them. I am still trying out different settings. I like the feel of this camera - its solid in my hand. The video works well. One thing - it gets cranky when you turn it on and don't have the lens cap off. It won't activate for a bit which can get awkward if folks are waiting for you to shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Val

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, nice photos
customer_reviews.text: this is really awesome! easy to carry around and operate. I wanted one for taking some photos when traveling, and I think this is it. I was worried about how it works in night, it turns out to be good. I even took a photo of the moon at the first night I got this. btw, i know nothing of the skills about how to take a good photo, which means this one is really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: A great camera at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Still discovering all the things that this camera will do. Great, variable pixel individual photos and video; movable image view finder; quality zoom out to 34 times (it's a Nikon after all). Three lovely colors available, too. Black, plum and red. OK, black is not a color; plum is a bit fruity for my taste, so red it is. The price makes this a great deal, too. BUT... lens filters will require an extension tube to attach.
customer_reviews.author: G in SC

customer_reviews.title: However the camera will do an easy point and shoot of faces
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed with the supposed IS, that being the reason I gave a 4 star v.s. a 5 star. I did get very detailed photo's of the full moon, however even on a tripod, the camera drifts. There are many settings to learn how to use. So spend some time, just taking pics to learn the camera first. I started out taking about 500 photo's a day, just to become familiar with the camera. However the camera will do an easy point and shoot of faces.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and awesome close-ups
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for new camera that took nice close-ups of family as well as my crafts. I was also looking for a camera to take non-flash pictures at events such as communions and dance recitals. I have to say this camera has performed way beyond my expectations! The resolution of the close-ups is fantastic and the zoom, non-flash shots are also fabulous...a great decision and purchase all the way around! Oh and I love the deep red color..I know exactly which camera is mine in the group on the table!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stypula

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Nikon
customer_reviews.text: Love the T/W lens, the scene choices, etc. The tilt screen is great, it allows this senior to get shots that would be difficult otherwise. I had considered a D-SLR, however this camera is all I need, and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Vilis

customer_reviews.title: Not a Wise Buy
customer_reviews.text: The batteries don't last long at all, so because you have to repurchase those, this camera is not a good buy. Add to that the the pictures are better on my phone (not a new one) and you should avoid this camera. There are better ones out there!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for four months
customer_reviews.text: I really thought I was going to like this camera as I liked the ac/dc plug which could be used instead of the batteries for filming youtube videos, and the fact it took AA batteries was a plus as I travel in foreign countries and they are readily available. Unfortunately after just four months I continually got "lens error" and the camera failed to work. The good news is that Amazon let me ship it back to them and paid for my return shipping, which restored my faith in purchasing online.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Shwader

customer_reviews.title: Works great as long as there is sufficient lighting
customer_reviews.text: Color quality is great. Synchs easily with my computer. Takes excellent video. Wish it has a port for an external mic though. Some times has difficulty focusing in low light situations, and the overall picture quality in low light is not good.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: It is also annoying that if I don't take the lens cap off ...
customer_reviews.text: As an experienced photographer I expected sharp clear photos. Every one I have taken is not sharp, not really frameable even as a 4x6 print. It is also annoying that if I don't take the lens cap off before turning the camera on it gives me a lens error message. I use both a digital SLR and a small camera for portability (have used NIkon for years) and this cameral is a real disappointment. I plan to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Great for me!
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome buy! I love the red color - it is redder than it appears in the pictures on Amazon - and I love the functionality of the flip screen. It is NOT the fastest camera to be honest, so if you want lots of quick shutter speed shots, you might want a higher model number, but for tourist attractions and general action (I did get some good shots of the Luau in Hawaii), this camera is great!
customer_reviews.author: D. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Camera died
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in November 2014. Used it several times, great picture quality. The just camera died less than three years. It was not dropped or anything - does not power on. There is no activity.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Nikon L830
customer_reviews.text: One of the features I love about this camera is all the special effects you can shoot pictures with. Plus the zoom is smooth and is great when trying to bring in that wildlife that is far off in the distance. I have found that the video is really great compared to an older video camera I had. The picture and sound are so much better. Plus here again, you can shoot your video with special effects. Great camera and so far I have no complaints on it at all. All of my photos have turned out great and it's so easy to use. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Ruiter

customer_reviews.title: Never had so much trouble with getting a good picture. Occasionally will get a great picture
customer_reviews.text: Pics blurry. Never had so much trouble with getting a good picture. Occasionally will get a great picture, but can't depend on this camera. Sorry that I bought two(one for my daughter and me) when she had a baby. Hit or miss pictures
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Simple Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I own a number of high end cameras but wanted an inexpensive point and shoot. This is perfect. Great images, runs on AA batteries so no need to charge ahead of time or carry a charger, great ergonomics - plus it's red! The optical zoom is impressive. And because it's an older model it's cheap!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a camera that was easy to use - no swapping out lenses or tricky settings. This one is perfect. Takes beautiful pictures!! I suggest reading the manual and learning as much as you can about the settings it does have. Movies, panoramic shots, close-ups and portraits are all wonderful! I highly recommend this product (my mom and my sister both bought one).
customer_reviews.author: ShannonThePotter

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality photos! I love it. Get rechargeable batteries, it eats regular batteries for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda M.

customer_reviews.title: I like the feel of it
customer_reviews.text: Just took my first pics of a sunset and they turned out lovely. I'm still learning to use it. I like the feel of it. I love the red color! And I was surprised to get the straps and all. It seems very easy to use. I'll be visiting family soon and we'll see how it does then with my very active granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Jrae1947

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion it is very fragile and does not maintain the brand's quality standard.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Ebling

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera but the LCD screen does not flip over ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera but the LCD screen does not flip over to protect it, it is always facing out. I bought this model as an upgrade and although I like it, I am always worried that I am going to scratch the screen even though I have a clear protector covering it. A lot of great features but camera body is still a bit BuLkY.
customer_reviews.author: Studio 54 - E Olson-Hulls

customer_reviews.title: Fine so far...
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like the camera. Haven't yet put it to the real test yet, have only taken about 60-70 pictures with it, but I'll use it a lot this next two weeks taking pictures for an online auction company. A bit bigger than I'm used to, but easy to hang on to, and features seem easy to select. At times I take upwards of 1,000 pictures in a day and wanted to stay with rechargable double A batteries for their life, and also wanted to stay with a full size SD card and this camera has both, which played a big part in my decision. I love the zoom on it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve McBride

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! The layout, and the design is perfect for me, and makes a great starter camera. The camera is true to its color in the pictures. I wish the screen could be a flip screen, and the downside is I thought it came with an SD Card but it doesn't:/ I was able to take about 5/7 pics without one, and based on the photos & few second vids, I can conclude that the quality looks great in great lighting, but stoops down to an iPhone 5 quality ( or lower ) in bad lighting- so lighting is key(:
customer_reviews.author: Girl with reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera that takes fantastic photos. I took it on my vacation and was able to use the museum setting in museums without the flash and got good photos. The zoom is great too. It is bigger than what I was actually hoping to get, but it's not heavy or hard to carry. The battery life was good too.
customer_reviews.author: reganda

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but not for me because of battery
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but it was my mistake that i did not read before I bought it that camera has disposable not chargable battery.
customer_reviews.author: Darya

customer_reviews.title: wonder if I might have had better luck if I hadn't
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I bought a refurbished camera, wonder if I might have had better luck if I hadn't. I've used better cameras and prefer them. No viewfinder, just a screen, large but not full-purpose. Telephoto didn't work reliably, wonder if that was part of the refurbished issues.I expected better from Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Seekins

customer_reviews.title: great pictures and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: great pictures and easy to use. Only problem I have it not having an eye view. I should have looked before I ordered. Do not like looking at the screen to take pictures. Real hard to see in bright sun light. I would have thought they would have put at least a small or basic memory card with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Borstad

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it love it. A year and a half later this camera had traveled around the world with my husband and I. Great pictures and great video
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this camera but my pictures did not come out as well as I had hoped. Perhaps it was user error but the instructions were greatly lacking in help. I will post an update if I can get this working better. I was hoping for some nice frameable prints from our vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Boulder Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and value.
customer_reviews.text: For the money I paid for this digital camera, I have taken really impressive photos and I will eventually move up to another level Nikon. I will always keep this handy as it is the perfect started camera for the novice or amateur photographer​.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Leake

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed using it on trips as well as out in ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this camera is a little larger than what I am used to, it is still compact enough for travel. Picture quality surpasses my expectations! I have enjoyed using it on trips as well as out in the pasture. The draw-back is having to go back to regular batteries! Aargh!
customer_reviews.author: romanticrancher

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been the best addition to our home office. It has features that we have not even yet explored. I was not sure how it would work, as I was coming from may years of using a different brand, but, this camera has, by far, exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: The Repair Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love it although I am still learning, it will zoom out and slap you in the face, am taking it with me to Europe in the summer this year, I like it being small also, it's easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J. Groblebe

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures that rival much more expensive DSLR cameras
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this camera a couple weeks but I find it incredibly versatile for a point and shoot. Takes great pictures that rival much more expensive DSLR cameras. Only shortcoming is that a viewfinder in addition to the screen would be very helpful when outside in bright sunlight. Screen is difficult to see in bight sunlight. For the price this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Johnpuhala

customer_reviews.title: Takes AA batteries, so if your batteries die and you're in a jam, you can get replacements anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than most point and shoots, but takes awesome photos. The best part is it takes AA batteries, so if your batteries die and you're in a jam, you can get replacements anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: jrjohn77

customer_reviews.title: Not really fond of this camera. it's compact but ...
customer_reviews.text: Not really fond of this camera. it's compact but I have a really hard time shooting pictures. the delay between pushing the button and the picture being taken is too long and i always miss my photo. disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great step up from you basic point and shoot and from the L820 that we had purchased earlier. We stayed with Nikon because of past cameras. Both of our point and shoots suffered from being dropped and broken battery doors. Cameras worked fine but you had to hold the battery door shut. Both the 820 and the 830 came with neck straps so hopefully they'll fare better. The zoom feature works great, the macro mode is great, the low light function works great (you probably will need the flash only in a dark room). Wonderful first camera or as a step up without spending big bucks.
customer_reviews.author: John Olson

customer_reviews.title: I loooove this camera. I did a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this camera. I did a lot of research looking for a simple camera, as I am a budding photographer and did not want to be overwhelmed. Every loves my camera and the photos I am able to take with it. I am a Nikon fan!
customer_reviews.author: karen morgan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an accomplished photographer but wanted a quality camera to learn how to get better photographs. This was a great price and is the easiest camera ever for taking a wide variety of pictures in all environments. It's easy to use and the on-camera instructions are extremely easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenixx

customer_reviews.title: The color is great for this little camera
customer_reviews.text: The color is great for this little camera. The pics are great too. I took it to Chicago and took some great pictures. I love the size and the grip on the side (makes it very easy to hold).
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Like it better than my SLR
customer_reviews.text: Very nice compact camera with 1080p video. powerful 34x zoom works good, so does the auto focus and other features. Has a great feature of SMILE that assures everyone in photo is smiling... had to laugh because it waited for the dog to show his teeth. Works great. Like everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: yardsale guy

customer_reviews.title: great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: fantastic SLR camera. easy to use, takes great pictures, and the price was fantastic. Believe this model is nearly obsolete, it's a shame, a nice camera at great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nikon's take the best photos no matter which model you get
customer_reviews.text: As far as I'm concerned, Nikon's take the best photos no matter which model you get.This was $10 off because it was red. How can you beat that?
customer_reviews.author: BJ Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Lasted well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter a while back. Wasn't sure it would last the absent mindedness and rough treatment but has performed well. Photos are great quality. Easy to operate yet still.offers some creative flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Salticrax

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Wonderful pictures far and close
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Wonderful pictures far and close. Love the ease of using this camera. Don't forget to order a memory card when you purchase this item. Regular batteries lasted through out an entire 8 days cruise trip to Alaska. Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: dbml

customer_reviews.title: The many, many refinements and features at a VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: The many, many refinements and features at a VERY reasonable price. Loves the 4 AA batteries. No more remembering to charge the spare lithium-ion battery for our other camera.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert B. Rickert, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Used all kinds of cameras for the last 40 years. Wanted a simple point and shoot to take quick high quality pix. None better. Nikon optics and ease of use are the best. Lacks some features of higher end (aperture priority, shutter priority, manual, bulb, etc.), but that is NOT what I wanted. Great camera, great price.
customer_reviews.author: lewis a. clark

customer_reviews.title: It's a Nikon...what else is there?
customer_reviews.text: This was gift for my parents, but I did set it up for them and take some shots with it. Very nice photos, clear & sharp. Great zoom. It's a Nikon what more is there to say. Great Camera for point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS BETTER THAN I EXPECTED! I want to start up my YouTube channel and I needed a camera to do so :) this one takes incredible videos and audio isn't bad either!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna S.

customer_reviews.title: A thrill to own
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the ad I was thrilled as I had checked it out before going to Amazon. When it came I was petrified to start all the things I had to do to really make it mine. BUT it was easy as pie and I am snapping to my hearts content.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: For good photos, get a great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my first quality camera. I absolutely love it. My pictures and videos come out so clear and great color quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cloud  Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera!! Bought it for a trip to Alaska and the pictures turned out amazing. I am not a photographer so the point and shoot works great for me. I would like to see future models have WIFI and viewer for your eye.
customer_reviews.author: Adam51883

customer_reviews.title: great zoom, farely compact body. wish it had rechargable built in.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but for my experience in taking and editing photos, the Galaxy Camera was a better choice for me. I have this camera for special events for its 34x optical zoom. For everything else, I take my galaxy camera everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied Sports Photographer
customer_reviews.text: This camera met all of my expectations. The moveable viewing screen aids in sports photography along with the quick recovery between shots is great for fast paced basketball and volleyball. I am still getting used to the computer hook-up as it is somewhat different than my previous DSLR, but it has worked well in the small uses I have started with to familiarize myself with its capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating close-ups.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and powerful, but it really fights focus on close-ups. My previous CoolPix was a fraction of the size/power/zoom but had no problem with very close-up shots. Menus are a lot less intuitive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Flannery

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best Camera I have ever owned......I'm a Professional Photographer for Auction Style selling online....and it's a Perfect Camera for doing online photo shoots......Kemi :o)
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this one
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems like we have found a great camera that meets our needs for taking pictures outside,inside,lowlight ,etc. We will update as time goes on but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: the laity of the pictures are just beautiful. I'm glad it wasn't too expensive otherwise it ...
customer_reviews.text: just tricky to hold properly and i don't know why. the laity of the pictures are just beautiful. I'm glad it wasn't too expensive otherwise it would have gone back just because it is difficult to hold still
customer_reviews.author: Fi P

customer_reviews.title: it was a perfect fit. She really wanted an SLR
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter. She loves it. For the price we paid on Amazon, it was a perfect fit. She really wanted an SLR, but she's not quite ready for that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bri1270

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera to my wife as a birthday gift. She loves it because it is easy to use and takes great pictures. As a casual camera to carry around to take pictures of the kids, this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Arther Picknose

customer_reviews.title: Great starter camera for all ages
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great to begin exploring photography. It’s not to complicated to use avid the quality it great. It has multiple settings to choose from and even a video option. Great starter device for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Laura clinton

customer_reviews.title: nothing but great photos!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has all the features you want for the right price. The photo here was taken on a cloudy day using auto feature and using the zoom from a somwhat unsteady kayak... nothing but great photos!
customer_reviews.author: M. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and seem like great pictures in Zion
customer_reviews.text: Took this camera with me to Utah on a visit/mini vacation. Easy to use and seem like great pictures in Zion,Arches and Bryce Canyon. Another visitor saw it and asked info so they could buy one. Especially like the ability to adjust the LCD screen to view better in bright sun.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Quade

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT point and shoot camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera - I could write volumes, will size my review up in one statement - IT'S PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Nanc

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Affordable, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's starter camera, and it is a nice one. It's simple to use and delivers excellent quality photos. For the money, I haven't seen a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: jolly_john

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX L830 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 34x Zoom NIKKOR Lens and Full 1080p HD Video
product_meta.description:
If you want to be delighted by your photos and HD videos; if you want to catch detailed close-ups of faraway action; if you like the styling of advanced cameras but want the simplicity of a point-and-shoot, say hello to the Nikon COOLPIX L830 Digital Camera. With a superb NIKKOR super telephoto glass lens that delivers 34x optical zoom plus an astounding 68x Dynamic Fine Zoom, you'll be amazed by how far you can reach. Hybrid Vibration Reduction helps ensure a little camera shake wont blur your videos-a big plus when shooting at these long zoom distances. The COOLPIX L830s comfortable design, elegantly simple controls and intuitive menu system make operation a breeze. You can even tilt the high-resolution LCD for a better view while recording Full HD 1080/60i video with stereo sound. Getting closer to the moments that matter just got easier. Zoom in Even Farther with Dynamic Fine Zoom Every COOLPIX is designed around a genuine NIKKOR glass lens, the legendary optics that have helped make Nikon famous. The COOLPIX L830s 34x optical zoom lens goes from wide-angle-great for portraits and landscapes-all the way up to telephoto-great for close-ups of sports, concerts, nature and more. When you need even more reach, zoom up to 34x with optical zoom and 68x with Dynamic Fine Zoom, an enhanced digital zoom function that effectively doubles your reach. Simple, Convenient Operation for Stress-free Shooting The COOLPIX L830 is so easy to use, anyone can take great photos and videos with it. Just turn the camera on, point, shoot and marvel at the results. For maximum point-and-shoot convenience, select Easy Auto Mode. It automatically optimizes the camera settings for each shot, no matter how challenging the situation. You'll be free to enjoy the moment while you capture it.3.0-inch 921,000-dot LCD Display Makes Every Photo and Video Look Great The COOLPIX L8

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 


If you want to be delighted by your photos and HD videos; if you want to catch detailed close-ups of faraway action; if you like the styling of advanced cameras but want the simplicity of a point-and-shoot, say hello to the COOLPIX L830. With a superb NIKKOR super telephoto glass lens that delivers 34x optical zoom plus an astounding 68x Dynamic Fine Zoom, you'll be amazed by how far you can reach. Hybrid Vibration Reduction helps ensure a little camera shake won't blur your videos—a big plus when shooting at these long zoom distances. The COOLPIX L830's comfortable design, elegantly simple controls and intuitive menu system make operation a breeze. You can even tilt the high-resolution LCD for a better view while recording Full HD 1080/60i video with stereo sound. Getting closer to the moments that matter just got easier. 

GET EVEN CLOSER TO WHAT MATTERS
ZOOM IN EVEN FARTHER WITH DYNAMIC FINE ZOOM
Every COOLPIX is designed around a genuine NIKKOR glass lens, the legendary optics that have helped make Nikon famous. The COOLPIX L830’s 34x optical zoom lens goes from wide-angle—great for portraits and landscapes—all the way up to telephoto—great for closeups of sports, concerts, nature and more. When you need even more reach, zoom up to 34x with optical zoom and 68x with Dynamic Fine Zoom, an enhanced digital zoom function that effectively doubles your reach. 

*Dynamic Fine Zoom magnification is calculated from the full-wide end of optical zoom.



MASTER THE CAMERA IN NO TIME
SIMPLE, CONVENIENT OPERATION FOR STRESS-FREE SHOOTING
The COOLPIX L830 is so easy to use, anyone can take great photos and videos with it. Just turn the camera on, point, shoot and marvel at the results. For maximum point-and-shoot convenience, select Easy Auto Mode. It automatically optimizes the camera settings for each shot, no matter how challenging the situation. You'll be free to enjoy the moment while you capture it.

ENJOY THE VIEW
3.0-INCH 921,000-DOT LCD DISPLAY MAKES EVERY PHOTO AND VIDEO LOOK GREAT
The COOLPIX L830's large, 921,000 LCD display makes it easy to compose your shots or monitor your video recording. Reviewing and sharing your creations is a pleasure, too—every shot looks fantastic on the display.

RECORD SUPERIOR VIDEOS
FULL HD 1080P VIDEOS WITH STEREO SOUND FOR DAZZLING MOVIES
If you want a compact camera that shoots stunning Full HD videos, the COOLPIX L830 delivers. Full HD 1080p means exceptional video quality. Record the action, then connect to an HDTV and watch your videos come alive. A built-in mic records high-quality audio in stereo. Your videos will look and sound phenomenal.





LET THE CAMERA CALL THE SHOTS
18 SCENE MODES FOR EFFORTLESS PHOTOS AND VIDEOS
Experienced photographers optimize their camera settings to match the situation. The COOLPIX L830 does that work for you. With 18 Scene Modes, including Beach, Snow, Night Portrait, Sunset and more, it's easy to match the moment to a Scene Mode. You can even get creative and use Scene Modes to alter ordinary shots. Or, select Easy Auto Mode and let the camera choose the best mode for your situation.







SUPPLIED ACCESSORIES
 * LC-CP28 Lens Cap
 * UC-E16 USB Cable
 * AN-CP21 Strap
feature_bullets: Top Continuous Shooting Speed at Full Resolution = Up to 5 shots at approx and 6.7 frames per second.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars612 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
